TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ColorConvertedBitmap extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public NotInheritable Class ColorConvertedBitmap Inherits BitmapSource Implements ISupportInitialize

span.span: Changes the color space of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 使用量資訊，請參閱[ColorConvertedBitmap 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md)。For XAML usage information, see [ColorConvertedBitmap Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md). 實作最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。 implements the interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties. 只有在物件初始化期間，才會發生屬性變更。Property changes can only occur during object initialization. 呼叫發出信號，初始設定開始和來表示已完成初始設定。Call to signal that initialization has begun and to signal that initialization has completed. 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。After initialization, property changes are ignored. 使用建立的物件建構函式會自動初始化，並且忽略屬性變更。 objects created using the constructor are automatically initialized, and property changes are ignored. A永遠不會快取。A is never cached. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立的執行個體並用它來將色彩轉換。The following example shows how to create an instance of and use it to convert color. [!code-csharp[bitmapimageprops#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapImageProps/CSharp/BitmapImageProps.cs#2)] [!code-vb[bitmapimageprops#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapImageProps/VB/BitmapImageProps.vb#2)]
